snippet: A week spent discussing deflated footballs, the rights of players to avoid the news media, and the status of Tom Brady’s cold ends in a game being played at 6:30 p.m. ET.
lead_paragraph: A week spent discussing deflated footballs, the rights of players to avoid the news media, and the status of Tom Brady’s cold ends in a game being played at 6:30 p.m. ET.

headline.main: Super Bowl 2015 Live Blog: Seahawks vs. Patriots
